getValue

public double getValue(double argument)

Returns:

wDistribution

public static double wDistribution(int n,
                                   double r)
Deprecated. 
The w-Distribution is important when calculating the expected values of the range of sample of normally distributed arguments. This function is hard to find even as a table in the literature. See DGQ Table 16 (taken from Biometrica Trust 1976); Definition is given in Reinert pg. 31;

Parameters:
n - The sample size (not degree of freedom!)
r - The range value
Returns:
the percentage of samples above a given span (range) r;
See Also:
if you need the reverse function
